page.title: 03SATURDAY.
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.30, get dressed and go downstairs. I normally have Weetabix with milk and no sugar and a drink of fruit juice.After using the bathroom at 9.00 I go to the shop to get my sweets.When I get back Mum and Dad are up and dressed and I get my 40p pocket money.At about 9.30 I watch Saturday Picture show on T.V. At 10.30 I get my modern dance things and get in the car.At 11.00 in Wadebridge I go in the town hall up to the Victoria room where I have a modern dance class.After this I meet Mum in the ballet room.We go to Barnicutts and buy 4 pasties and a sausage roll for our lunch. After lunch I sometimes play outside if it is fine. For tea at about 4.00 I normally have sandwiches. Then I have a bath and Dad reads us a story before bed.
